entry.title: Resize Images
entry.content:
Showing that images can be resized and how to arange them with <br>

Also, layout. If you don’t leave blank line between things, they will try to appear on the same line. (first two images.) Even if you leave a blank line, the two things will be touching. (first image touching third image.)


This (above) is slightly different from this (below).



To avoid this, use <br>, which means new line.

This <br> moves image 2 to the next line.
This <br> moves what ever is after it down a line.
This line and <br>’s after it adds an extra line, making some white space between image 2 and 3.



So if I have some text.

Leave a bunch of white space.

These lines will appear just next to each other.


So if I want space.









A bunch of <br> will do the trick.
entry.summary: Showing that images can be resized and how to arange them with <br>

entry.title: Test Post
entry.content:
I am testing the post feature. I leared today that you cannot use a date that hasn’t happened yet, but that does mean you can pre-make a page that will become avalible on the date.

Example:

post dated “2050-12-31”

will not be visible until Dec. 31 2050
